snippet.title: Marvel: Avengers Alliance - Announce Trailer
snippet.description:
Check out the trailer for "Marvel: Avengers Alliance," Marvel's first Facebook game coming soon! The Avengers join forces with Wolverine, Spider-Man, the Fantastic Four and more to prevent a cataclysmic event in this new free-to-play strategy game.

Visit the official Facebook page of "Marvel: Avengers Alliance": https://www.facebook.com/avengersalliance

Subscribe to Marvel's official YouTube channel: http://www.youtube.com/marvel
